description:
If you have been following my YouTube channel, then you might be able to connect that I had a 3-way video setup for this weekend of this shoot. I had hoped that everyone would show up, but was not optimistic.
I don�t know why I have trouble getting everyone on set for the 3-ways. But we had one guy fail to show up, so it was just going to be Griffin and Truman. From now on, I am setting up 4-ways so that at the very least I can get a 3-way in! I can do this!
Griffin and Truman go at it likes pros, and they both take turns fucking each other. It�s up to you to decide who is the better bottom and who is the better top!
It is a hot video with lots of flip-flopping and two great cum shots!
title: Griffin Barrows & Truman - RAW
